H0.text: what is the currency in turkey called. Ottoman Dollar

H1.text: what is the currency in turkey called. Anatolian Pound

H2.text: what is the currency in turkey called. Bosphorus Franc

H3.text: what is the currency in turkey called. Turkish lira

A4.text: The lira (Turkish: Türk lirası; sign: ₺; ISO 4217 code: TRY; abbreviation: TL) is the official currency of Turkey.

A5.text: The current lira is the Second Turkish lira, having succeeded the first Turkish lira in 2005 which in turn succeeded the Ottoman lira in 1923.
